mapper.select:
select rd.doctor_flow, rd.doctor_name, su.user_head_img doctor_img, sar.sch_start_date, sar.sch_end_date, rdsp.start_date, rdsp.end_date, rdsp.sch_score score, rdsp.sch_flag, rdsp.is_current_flag, sar.result_flow, sar.sch_dept_name, rdsp.process_flow from pdsci.res_doctor_sch_process rdsp LEFT JOIN res_power_cfg rpc on 'res_doctor_web_' || rdsp.user_flow = rpc.cfg_code inner join pdsci.sch_arrange_result sar on sar.record_status = 'Y' and sar.result_flow = rdsp.sch_result_flow inner join pdsci.res_doctor rd on rd.record_status = 'Y' and rdsp.user_flow = rd.doctor_flow inner join pdsci.sys_user su on su.record_status = 'Y' and su.user_flow = rd.doctor_flow where rdsp.record_status = 'Y' and rdsp.teacher_user_flow = #{teacherUserFlow}
and rpc.record_status = 'Y' and rpc.cfg_value = 'Y' and ( (rpc.power_start_time between rdsp.sch_start_date and rdsp.sch_end_date ) or (rpc.power_end_time between rdsp.sch_start_date and rdsp.sch_end_date) or (rdsp.sch_start_date >= rpc.power_start_time and rdsp.sch_end_date <= rpc.power_end_time) )
and rd.doctor_name like '%${doctorName}%'
and rdsp.is_current_flag = 'Y'
and rdsp.sch_flag = 'Y'

SELECT rd.doctor_flow, rd.doctor_name, su.user_head_img AS doctor_img, sar.sch_start_date, sar.sch_end_date, rdsp.start_date, rdsp.end_date, rdsp.sch_score AS score, rdsp.sch_flag, rdsp.is_current_flag, sar.result_flow, sar.sch_dept_name, rdsp.process_flow FROM pdsci.res_doctor_sch_process rdsp LEFT JOIN res_power_cfg rpc on 'res_doctor_web_' || rdsp.user_flow = rpc.cfg_code INNER JOIN pdsci.sch_arrange_result sar ON sar.record_status = 'Y' AND sar.result_flow = rdsp.sch_result_flow INNER JOIN pdsci.res_doctor rd ON rd.record_status = 'Y' AND rdsp.user_flow = rd.doctor_flow INNER JOIN pdsci.sys_user su ON su.record_status = 'Y' AND su.user_flow = rd.doctor_flow WHERE rdsp.record_status = 'Y'
and rpc.record_status = 'Y' and rpc.cfg_value = 'Y' and ( (rpc.power_start_time between rdsp.sch_start_date and rdsp.sch_end_date ) or (rpc.power_end_time between rdsp.sch_start_date and rdsp.sch_end_date) or (rdsp.sch_start_date >= rpc.power_start_time and rdsp.sch_end_date <= rpc.power_end_time) )
and (rdsp.sch_flag ='Y' or rdsp.is_current_flag='Y')
and rdsp.TEACHER_USER_FLOW = #{teacherUserFlow}
and su.USER_NAME like #{name}
and (exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = rdsp.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null AND RR.REC_TYPE_ID ='AfterSummary' ) or ( not exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = rdsp.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.rec_type_id ='AfterEvaluation' ) )
or ( not exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = rdsp.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.rec_type_id in ('MonthlyAssessment_inpatientArea','MonthlyAssessment_clinic') ) )
)
and exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = rdsp.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null AND RR.REC_TYPE_ID ='AfterSummary' )
and ( not exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = rdsp.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.rec_type_id in ( #{item}) ) )
ORDER BY sar.sch_start_date DESC

if.if:
select rr.oper_user_flow, rr.oper_user_name, rr.process_flow, rr.rec_type_id from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.process_flow=#{processFlow} and rr.rec_type_id = 'AfterSummary' and rr.record_status='Y' and rr.oper_user_flow=#{docFlow} and rr.AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null
UNION ALL SELECT a.oper_user_flow,RR.OPER_USER_NAME,a.process_flow, a.rec_type_id FROM ( SELECT #{docFlow} oper_user_flow, #{processFlow} PROCESS_FLOW ,'AfterEvaluation' REC_TYPE_ID FROM DUAL ) a left join RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr on rr.process_flow=a.process_flow and rr.rec_type_id = a.rec_type_id and rr.oper_user_flow=a.oper_user_flow and rr.record_status='Y' where a.oper_user_flow=#{docFlow} and rr.AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null
UNION ALL SELECT a.oper_user_flow,RR.OPER_USER_NAME,a.process_flow, a.rec_type_id FROM ( SELECT #{docFlow} oper_user_flow, #{processFlow} PROCESS_FLOW ,'MonthlyAssessment_clinic' REC_TYPE_ID FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT #{docFlow} oper_user_flow, #{processFlow} PROCESS_FLOW ,'MonthlyAssessment_inpatientArea' REC_TYPE_ID FROM DUAL ) a left join RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr on rr.process_flow=a.process_flow and rr.rec_type_id = a.rec_type_id and rr.oper_user_flow=a.oper_user_flow and rr.record_status='Y' where a.oper_user_flow=#{docFlow} and rr.AUDIT_STATUS_ID is null and not exists( select null from RES_SCH_PROCESS_EXPRESS rr where rr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and rr.PROCESS_FLOW = a.PROCESS_FLOW and rr.rec_type_id in ('MonthlyAssessment_inpatientArea','MonthlyAssessment_clinic') )
